author: boma_naps
content: Hey everyone, we've opened an EthMagicians thread for the API endpoint versioning discussion we've been working on. We'd love broader community input especially from wallet devs and anyone affected before we finalize v1 please drop your thoughts there and share it with anyone who might be interested. https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/repo-endpoint-level-versioning-for-the-json-rpc-api-seeking-community/27765?u=bomanaps
